trans-unit.source: This order is managed by Hello Harel.
trans-unit.target: Cette commande est gérée par Hello Harel.

trans-unit.source: Products are managed by Hello Harel
trans-unit.target: Les produits sont gérés par Hello Harel

trans-unit.source: This product is managed by Hello Harel.
trans-unit.target: Ce produit est géré par Hello Harel.

trans-unit.source: Hello Harel and PrestaShop have been successfully unlinked!
trans-unit.target: Hello Harel et PrestaShop ont bien été déliés !

trans-unit.source: You are only one last step away from integrating Hello Harel with PrestaShop!
trans-unit.target: Il ne vous reste qu'une seule étape pour finir l'intégration de Hello Harel avec PrestaShop !

trans-unit.source: Go to your Hello Harel instance and navigate to:
trans-unit.target: Ouvrez votre instance Hello Harel et naviguez vers :

trans-unit.source: Open the PrestaShop app from the list
trans-unit.target: Open the PrestaShop app from the list

trans-unit.source: Go to the "App settings" tab from the PrestaShop modal
trans-unit.target: Go to the "App settings" tab from the PrestaShop modal

trans-unit.source: And copy the following information in the form:
trans-unit.target: And copy the following information in the form:

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to unlink PrestaShop from your Hello Harel instance?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to unlink PrestaShop from your Hello Harel instance?

trans-unit.source: Your mapping (products, customers, orders) will be kept if you want to link them again later.
trans-unit.target: Your mapping (products, customers, orders) will be kept if you want to link them again later.

trans-unit.source: This PrestaShop instance is now controlled by %instanceUrl%.
trans-unit.target: This PrestaShop instance is now controlled by %instanceUrl%.

trans-unit.source: Your Hello Harel instance now controls PrestaShop. This is an overview of the mapping between PrestaShop and Hello Harel:
trans-unit.target: Your Hello Harel instance now controls PrestaShop. This is an overview of the mapping between PrestaShop and Hello Harel:
